import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-customers', templateUrl: './customers.component.html' }) export class CustomersComponent { public customers: Customers[] = []; constructor(http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') baseUrl: string) { http.get(baseUrl + '/api/customers').subscribe(result => { this.customers = result; }, error => console.error(error)); } } interface Customers { id: number; name: string; }
